籤詩版本二:
Ngexesha lembalela wonke amasimi abunile, Bulelani kuThixo ngemvula emnandi.
Iintyatyambo, iziqhamo, nohlaza zonke zifumile, yaye ndiyaqonda ukuba imvula enye ixabisa iwaka legolide.
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lwembalela kunye nemvula eswiti.
Kubo bonke ubunzima kukho usindiso.
解曰:
Imibungu yesilika yasendle ivuthwe ngokuphindwe kabini. Isiphelo siza ngokuthe ngcembe. Isifo sidibana neyeza ezilungileyo. Ukuphazamiseka kwabahambi ngeenyawo.
(Ayiyongxaki → Uxolo.)
籤詩故事一:
◇Isindisiwe iRokuro
UYang Yanzhao (958-1014) wayengunyana wesithandathu kaYang Ye.Igama lakhe lokwenyani yayinguYanlang, nokwaziwa ngokuba nguYang Liulang.Wazalwa ngonyaka wesihlanu kaZhou Xiande (958) emva kweeDynasties eziHlanu.WayengowaseLinzhou (ngoku uShenmu, uShaanxi).
UYang Ye wakhokela imikhosi emithathu waza warhangqwa ngumkhosi wabalandeli, uYang Ye wabetha intloko yakhe kwilitye lesikhumbuzo likaLi Ling waza wafa.
UYang Qilang ucele uncedo kwaye wadutyulwa lutolo wafa, uLiulang wahlehla waya eHulu Valley. Wahlangulwa yimonki kwiNtaba iWutai (Yang Wulang) yaye wayephuma engozini.
(Imonki iza kuhlangula. Lo ngumzekeliso wemvula ngexesha elifanelekileyo.)
聖意: Thandazela ikhaya lakho kunye nekhaya lakho ukuze uzikhusele, ufune ubutyebi, ube nezivumelwano ezintle, ungabikho emva kwexesha lomtshato, kwaye utshate eLiujia. abantu, izimangalo, ilahleko, ukufuduka, ukugcinwa, kunye nezinto ezilahlekileyo. Intshona (qaphela: umntla ngowamanzi kwaye intshona yeyegolide) Izifo zibonelelwa (ziya kuphiliswa) ) Shanfen Anji
